2.Скопировать содержимое папки SKIDROW в папку с установленной игрой с заменой 
3. Установить директХ с образа

it keeps crashing at the loading sreen as soon as i start a new game  can any one help me out?
So I run the setup but once I go next a few times it asks me to insert disk 1, is this meant to show up? If so, what do I do at this bit?
Appreciate the effort, but for me it goes to a black screen, crashes and says that the nv program has stopped responding

the downlode toke me 3 hours and 13 min
so i hope it works

For anyone having troubles

1.Download this torrent
2.Download the Skidrow crack
3.Download DAEMON Tools if you don't have it
4.Right click on daemon tools on the right side of the taskbar, go to virtual devices, then (E:) No Media, then mount image
5.Find this torrent in your files and then mount it.
6.When it's done, go to the skidrow crack folder then copy FalloutNV and FalloutNVLauncher into the Fallout New Vegas game file that you mounted.
7.After the, you're done and can play (:
